attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Put road tax on fuel.

You pay depending how much you drive, what you drive and how you drive it. The fuel pumps will incentivise or penalise. 
There would be less tax dodging and much lower administration costs.
Just think of the tax saving in that alone. 
The complexity, inefficiency and unfairness of this current cobbled together road tax will cause confusion and anger for years to come.
